EmailTemplate.description: This email template used to notify Peer Reviewer that Dental Benefit Coding is ready for review
EmailTemplate.name: GEMS Dental BC PeerReviewer Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Account} - {!Case.Account_Number__c} - {!Case.GEMS_Case_Effective_Date__c} - Dental Benefit Coding Peer Reviewer Approval Request
